si.title: "සහෝදරවරුනි, මට සාමකාමීව යන්න දෙන්න"
body_lines: වඩමරාච්චි නැගෙනහිර නගර් කෝවිලේ පාවීම අද උදෑසන සම්පූර්ණ කළ පාවීමකි.

en.title: "Let me go peacefully, brothers"
body_lines: A float in the Vadamarachchi East Nagar Temple is a float that has been fulfilled this morning.
The words "Parameswari - let me go in peace, brothers".

summary_lines: "Parameswari - let me go in peace, brothers. A float in the Vadamarachchi East Nagar Temple has been fulfilled this morning."
